mapper.update: update subsection set subsectionName = #{subsectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subsectionTime = #{subsectionTime,jdbcType=TIME}, subsectionChecked = #{subsectionChecked,jdbcType=BIT}, section_sectionId = #{section_sectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subsectionContent = #{subsectionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where subsectionId = #{subsectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select subsectionId, subsectionName, subsectionTime, subsectionChecked, section_sectionId, subsectionContent from subsection where subsectionId = #{subsectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select subsectionId, subsectionName, subsectionTime, subsectionChecked, section_sectionId, subsectionContent from subsection
